column4: hi guys when I go to the youtube website the videos are very fragmented. The video is not fluent. Why?
youtube-dl ??
I need to see it inside the youtube website
not outside
it's not a internet speed connection
if you're getting bad pages, then wireshark will tell you why.
wireshark ?
it's a packet analyzer
it marks bad packets in red
it marks bad packets in red.
and, if you look at it, it will tell you what went wrong, so you could fix it.
what is wireshark?
and it's in the ubuntu sepositories
sudo apt-get install wireshark
or something like that.  If your pages are coming in badly, *W I R E S H A R K* will tell you why
or something like that.  If your pages are coming in badly, *W I R E S H A R K* will tell you why
ok thanks
